parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post might not be directly linked to official electoral campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions the PSD (Partidul Social Democrat) and implicitly encourages voting for them.  While it doesn't name specific candidates, it clearly refers to a political party participating in the elections. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The targeting parameters (age, location) further confirm its intention to address a broad segment of the population in Maramureș County. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters in Maramureș County to vote for the PSD in the local elections. The call to action ("Vă invit duminică să îi votați pentru că votându-i pe ei, ajutați comunitățile Maramureșului! Duminică votăm echilibrat, votăm PSD!") directly aims to influence voting behavior. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected from journalistic reporting. Instead, it promotes a specific political party and encourages voters to support them.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear political advertisement promoting a specific party. The statement about investments in schools, kindergartens, and hospitals is presented as a promise made by the PSD, not a personal reflection.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1295415661810762</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Gabriel Valer Zetea, promotes the PSD party and directly encourages voters to support them in the local elections.  The post's targeting, call to action, and association with the PSD clearly indicate an intention to influence the election outcome.  While it doesn't explicitly mention specific candidates, the implicit endorsement of the PSD constitutes electoral propaganda. The post was published after the official campaign period ended, potentially violating Article 98 t).  The ad's reach (100K-500K) and spend (RON 200-299) further highlight its potential impact.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>PSD</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Gabriel Valer Zetea, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu ID-ul 1295415661810762, care promovează Partidul Social Democrat (PSD) și îndeamnă direct la votarea acestuia în alegerile locale. Postarea, cu un buget de 200-299 RON, a atins o audiență estimată la 100.000-500.000 de persoane, având un efect electoral clar prin îndemnul direct la vot pentru PSD.  Fraza „Vă invit duminică să îi votați pentru că votându-i pe ei, ajutați comunitățile Maramureșului! Duminică votăm echilibrat, votăm PSD!” constituie o încălcare evidentă a legislației electorale, fiind o formă de propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea campaniei.  Contactul advertiserului este babici_ama@yahoo.com și +40747223007.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
